text: Montchauvet is a former commune. It is in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Souleuvre-en-Bocage.Arrêté préfectoral 1 December 2015 ==Related pages== *Communes of the Calvados department == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Montchauvet, Calvados
